thread.title: Sainz ruled fit to race in Russia after heavy crash
thread.title_full: Sainz ruled fit to race in Russia after heavy crash

title: Sainz ruled fit to race in Russia after heavy crash
text: > Top News Sainz ruled fit to race in Russia after heavy crash Toro Rosso driver Carlos Sainz Jr. of Spain, lies on a stretcher inside an helicopter to be transfer to a hospital, after crashing during the third free practice session at the 'Sochi Autodrom' Formula One track , in Sochi, Russia, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. A heavy crash for Carlos Sainz Jr. ended the final practice session at the Russian Grand Prix on Saturday with the Toro Rosso driver hospitalized. The Formula one race will be held on Sunday. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno)
